Subject: Uploading data using ssh is blocked by CAP and not getting allowed even after authorizing
Description: Inhouse application need report upload using ssh through a script. It gets blocked by CAP policy as per the policy. But it does not get approved even after authorizing.
What_We_Know__c:
Customer have an issue with an Inhouse application that need to report upload using ssh through a script. It gets blocked by CAP policy as per the policy. But it does not get approved even after authorising.

Their CAP is set to block and remediate.
Next_Steps__c:
We tried to gather more details regarding the issue encountered. 
They mention that the issue persist even if they remediate the block and request a set of logs from their side. 

They will provide the logs after they manage to update the EPP server and client to the latest version.

Send them a few instructions to verify if the endpoint is communicating with the EPP server.

The customer manage to install the 6.2.3.1 client version which helped them to fix the issue .
Solution_Comment__c: fixed after upgrading to the latest EPP client
